Sentencas: Bi2O3 compositions were prepared to investigate the effect of rare earth metal oxides as co-dopants on phase stability of bismuth oxide.
Titulo: Effect of Y2O3 and Er2O3 co-dopants on phase stabilization of bismuth oxide

Sentencas: Compositions containing 9-14 mol% of Y2O3 and Er2O3 were synthesized by solid state reaction.
Titulo: Effect of Y2O3 and Er2O3 co-dopants on phase stabilization of bismuth oxide

Sentencas: The structural characterization was carried out using X-ray powder diffraction.
Titulo: Effect of Y2O3 and Er2O3 co-dopants on phase stabilization of bismuth oxide

Sentencas: The XRD results show that the samples containing 12 and 14 mol% total dopants had cubic structure, whereas the samples with lower dopant concentrations were tetragonal.
Titulo: Effect of Y2O3 and Er2O3 co-dopants on phase stabilization of bismuth oxide

Sentencas: Comparing the lattice parameters of the cubic phases of (Bi2O3)(0.88)(Y2O3)(0.06)(Er2O3)(0.06) and (Bi2O3)(0.86)(Y2O3)(0.07)(Er2O3)(0.07) revealed that lattice parameter decreases by increasing the dopant concentration.
Titulo: Effect of Y2O3 and Er2O3 co-dopants on phase stabilization of bismuth oxide

Sentencas: The XRD pattern and the powder density results indicated the formation of solid solution in the studied systems.
Titulo: Effect of Y2O3 and Er2O3 co-dopants on phase stabilization of bismuth oxide

Sentencas: After annealing samples with cubic phase at 600 degrees C for various periods of time, phase transformation to tetragonal and rhombohedral occurs.
Titulo: Effect of Y2O3 and Er2O3 co-dopants on phase stabilization of bismuth oxide

Titulo: Effect of Y2O3 and Er2O3 co-dopants on phase stabilization of bismuth oxide
Effect of Y2O3 and Er2O3 co-dopants on phase stabilization of bismuth oxide
